title: Dignity
description:
Kai Choyce, Cody Hom, Oz du Soleil and Judith Hertog share true stories about nightmare roommates, racist nicknames, Navy memories and the significance of kneeling.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jay Som, Amo Amo, Judith Hertog, Xavier, Cody Hom, Kevin Allison, Our Native Daughters, Oz du Soleil, Kai Choyce, Poolside)
